metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1002209 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
QuaZIP before 0.7.6 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowingattackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Ziparchive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability isalso known as 'Zip-Slip'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1002209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquazip5-1 - 0.7.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquazip package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.6-1').
